thx  thx   thx  thx   thx  thx   thx  thx
sinkunZzang
hello algo!!
hello xoryla!
hoping for super gaming today
I hope so too
@sinkun33 hello :O
I have been a little frustrated with how slow the kid moves on screen, most of the dodges I see don't work because I can't make it to the safe spot in time @xoryla
haven't thought there can be that kind of problem
interesting
like, you found this problem only now
hi
I know I am bad too, but for instance, on the final attack, there can be cases where even with perfect reaction you cannot live
xoryla
oh yeah final attack
It is a problem I have felt for a while, ever since I saw jaimers complaining about the slow speed of the kid in his k3 clear video
but It is a problem I have been feeling more recently as I have gotten better at reading
your reads became way better
indeed
hopefully they will become even better in the future
reading is my number 1 practice priority
there's no limit B)
I think it's the most important skill in avoidance
pretty hard to read attacks if you are sleep deprived
and to execute them
as well
that is also true
@sinkun33 i saw you got tomo stage in 2 hours, you absolute madman dude
I'm just worried that the slow speed of the kid encourages dodges that would be bad practice for a game where your movement is faster, like in a conventional shmup
lol
yeah, he just obliterated tomo stage
It's going to be the fastest one I've ever done.
made it look easy
today i finally passed prefinal attack in gureiga though
and
To be honest, I thought it would take more than 10 hours.
you know what
i died on the last second of the avoidance
ow
just because of a bad read
but at least it is progress
Now I'm having a lot of trouble with afoth stage than ao and tomo.
@sinkun33 10 hours is also pretty good time for tomo haha
@sinkun33 i assume mostly because of 2nd rainbow drop?
My condition is really good these days
because i was failing to 2nd drop so many times
so many that this grind became a true hell
And honestly, the pattern came out easily.
yeah, afoth is a paradise for people who are good with pattern learning
Strangely, I am strong in strong games and weak in weak games.
pyun struggled with it too
even though he is good at pattern
It's really weird. I don't know either. lol
and then me, who had to develop a good muscle memory literally for each afoth attack
which was a hard long time
died to 2nd drop like 80 times, to prefinal ~10 times and to the final attack 2
to the final 1 time*
BloodTrail
I arrived at the afoth outro in an hour, but I've been struggling for 5 hours since then. lol
afoth stage does not look as balanced as gureiga to be honest
gureiga is mostly barrage thing
And maybe because Tomo tried Happy Fantazma, it wasn't that hard. I think I cleared it easily because I'm used to the pattern.
i started hating gureiga just because of prefinal attack i died more than 30 times on to this point
I'm worried about gureiga, too.
happy fantazma experience is definitely a big factor in a fast tomo stage clear
youll be good with it
Honestly, you don't look like you want to do it.
im pretty worried about tomo stage though
which will be my last avoidance before 100%
Maybe if you play bg 100%, you can get the ability to clear everything like ds and mayumushi.
i cleared ds lol
LUL
SeemsGood
you are halfway there already, xoryla!
but he told me he wants to do adam's curtain call game next
well my ds clear was a huge fluke so I don't think i totally deserve it
I think a clear is a clear, no matter how lucky you get
@algosith true, i love it
but I agree, luck played a big factor
I wonder if it is possible to get that lucky on maymushi
Oh! Congratulations! I didn't know. You're very good.
thanks sinkun ;)
But honestly, if you're used to the pattern, mayumushi is easier than ds.
yeah, I remember you said something like that before
in fact, it is one of the reasons I chose to play DS instead of mayumushi right now
I wanted to play the hardest barrage I could
if i come up with idea of starting playing mayumushi, i will definitely use practice for patterns
because im bad at pattern learning
Yes, if you clear the ds, you can clear the mayumushi.
spent 6 hours to learn gureiga pattern without practicing
@sinkun33 do you really think that galaxy collapse is harder than last tis?
that's kinda bad for me

I don't have any preconceived notions about practice. Honestly, if I haven't done avidance for a long time, I don't think I can challenge myself to the top except to clear it with practice and improve my skills rapidly.
To be honest, last tis is much harder.
I agree
But mentally, galaxy collapse is too painful.
LUL
yeah, true
I agree on that too
is galaxy collapse harder than DS, at least?
Dry eyes get worse.
yes
okay, that's good
I think I'm one step ahead of vox abs.

yeah, probably

vox absðŸ’€

by the look

I think casualcrap is of the opinion that even the original is luckbased
and I usually trust him when it comes to rating that
I think casualcrap is reliable.
we all trust skilled players opinions
I trust some good player's opinions more than others LUL pyun rates fish 68 difficulty, and that's just wrong
fish 68 umm
kinda weird
Honestly, I respect that person. His will is amazing.
I'm tired of last tis, so I often give up
casualcrap or pyun?
yeah, his passion was unbelievable
He went on without stopping. He continued.
oh casualcrap
casual

too bad he has not had time to stream recently
sad

he is very dedicated
verre without practice tool seems like torture
Honestly, I thought Mir would give up in the middle of the ftfa.
and ftfa deathless 300 hours
yeah, mir is a patient guy
rock-solid mental
the only thing I have seen him temporarily give up on is flow
flow?
If the game lasts more than 100 hours, I will give up because I am angry.
I wanna flow @xoryla game with hard/bullshit last save
oh, that's a game
didn't know
@sinkun33 good thing you are good enough that nothing takes you that long anymore except last tis LUL
if the game lasts more than 100 hours for me, id be more frustrated than angry
I arrived at the last save of the flow, but I was angry and painful even with 100 deaths, and when I play needle, my stomach feels upset.
because i am very addicted to my stats
and i can't do anything with that
@sinkun33 what about your hands, do they hurt too?
The only thing I've done more than 100 hours is entrance.
oh, I remember that one
today is the day
I've gotten a lot better.
hi ubur, I think you missed the day when I actually beat most of the avoidance @Ubur
algosith well yea it wasnt the day @algosith
yeah, sinkun, you are leaps and bounds better than you were back then, your dedication to avoidance is impressive. Many players have quit, but you have kept going
hello ubur
entrance gave me so much despair that I gave up on iwanna for 4 years.
I can imagine, that game is torture
but we are glad you are back
which entrance though
touch the entrance, by leehe
oh, touch the entrance
Honestly, I was very busy with my studies at that time.lol
good luck with this
yeah, balancing real life and i wanna is hard
the games are very demanding
I'm relaxed now because I'm discharged from the military.
clear
To be honest, the gap of a year and a half while I was in the army was too fatal to me.
i know justdont couldn't avoid military thing
and he was so frustrated about that
If I hadn't joined the army, I would have cleared the last tis by now.
good thing he at least accomplished his fangame goals
before army moment
yes, your youth was wasted by military service
it is very unfortunate

Before joining the army, I cleared it very quickly, such as alien mhc ds fantasyazma, so my heyday probably came at that time, but it went down the drain, and I started again and recovered from a very rusty state after I was discharged.
you seem to be back on form recently at least
but yeah, last tis clear was severely delayed
That makes two of us.
but it will happen
I will do my best
I think I'll clear the last tis one day, but there are so many avoidance I want to do now lol
I know you want to do all of  ao's, are there others?
hmm
afoth
tokoroten
ouka?

yeah, avoiding the bad games is a nice idea
some of the games they made are not worth playing

be abhorrent That kind of game...
that's a great example of something no one should play
I hate being dependent on luck
but you like ds?
is it not very luckbased for you

pretty much

so when you clear the original game, youll basically have 2 ds clears Kappa

I agree, this is much close to clear than, for example, dying to final like plynq @sinkun33
since final is really hard and intro is free, as xoryla said
It feels like skipping the ftfa intro and playing

lol
congrats
nice player
oh god
jammin
to 1.1x music
it is possible to correct the pitch, but I like it better like this Keepo
well i have a poor fangame experience so i am not as nice player as you sinkun
"not being as good as sin kun" still leaves a lot of room for being a great player
only 5 cleared fangames for all the time
there is a lot of room at the bottom
ðŸ¤˜
soon it will be 6, I'm sure @xoryla
yeah i just wanted to mention sinkun in my message
Well, I don't think I'm talented, just because I've been doing this for a long time. The next generation of prospects will be much better than me.
yeah, the newer players have the advantage because they can "stand on the shoulders of giants" so to speak
and practice tools are more popular Keepo
god so fast music i can't catch up jammin
1.1 clear of this game would be funny, maybe I will do it eventually
funny thing i was playing it without practice because i just couldn't find it LUL
However, most of the top players now are players who have enjoyed it since a long time ago.
not sure where it would fall in terms of difficulty, that's the problem
yeah, aside from dragonxplayer, I'd say that it's mostly older players
ao zero casual
All 2012 players.
It's 2012 for me too.
interesting
was it early 2012, or late 2012?
if you remember
dragonx is growing in avoidance skills by leaps and bounds :O
I think it was around December.
thanks, I was wondering
that means the tis clear was pretty quick then
Do you know daburyu?
yes
not personally
but I know who he is
He was more dangerous than ao in 2012.
yes
he also won the last tis tournament
barely, but still
yes
I am not sure what his reason was for quitting though
Honestly, if I had played so far, I think I would have cleared last tis for the first time.
It's probably because of the present life. Because he was quite old,
yeah, last tis was within reach for a long time, but no one went for it for a long while. Like casualcrap could've cleared it in 2017
oh, so then it was a similar reason to Lilly's
In 2012, there were a lot of talented people like monsters.
god, 2012 and people were already doing insane things
I have a lot of catching up to do LUL
that has always been my feeling with avoidance
can't believe that was that long ago
like, in 2012 i was 7 years old BloodTrail
yoooo GL!
yoo, elcochran, glad to see you
glad you could catch a stream
yeah, me too
it's lunch time at work but I'm at home office SeemsGood
I have a bad habit of jumping on "walk or die"
probably not the best move
me too, so relatable
it is necessary sometimes you know
walk or die was such a roadblock for me
@xoryla yes, but I do it when it's both not necessary and also dangerous
to get an acceptable consistency on this attack, it took months
so this attack is infamous for me
yeah, it's a crazy attack
I'm definitely making a mental note not to make anything like it if I make an avoidance
lol true
will it happen tho? Keepo
well, i saw last z destruction state
walk or die on this one is pretty acceptable
turns out when you nerf the speed on every attack, it's pretty fair LUL
like so nerfed attack that it starts being funny if you compare this and original walk or die
yeah, it's enough to make me laugh
it's like the avoidance is an old man who can't walk well
that's what it makes me think of
the attacks just try to hit your but they're too slow
at least they try LUL
yeah, no offense to old men. And then regular ds is the spry youngun who runs up to you and slaps you in the face.
i saw what they did with the fall attack in last z ds
let me try going back to 1.0 and see how it feels
horrible........
what did they do?
feels slow LUL
2 bursts on the end of the fall are just a small couple of arrow bullets that don't even seem to hit a player
yeah, that's practically removing the attack Keepo
those bursts are the meat of the attack
take those out and there's nothing left
well, why am i saying something about that. it's just nerfed for a medley game
to make this avoidance be enjoyable for last z players
I wonder if people liked it
I know ipecac played it
i am just making inoffensive fun of that ;)
maybe some original game attempts soon?
how do you feel about it
I feel like I suck at 1.0 and am concerned how long it would take to get sufficiently lucky to clear
my next-best attempt after that run I got a few days ago is from phase 4
which is a pretty big difference
honestly, If you compare my gameplay to say, bloggerop's when he was getting attempts to final, I am a lot worse
and it still took him so long to clear
if i remember, you did a "clear" in practice tool being in a bad gaming condition
yeah, but that's luck
I mean, my goal is to get better, not luck through games, exactly
I will take good rng if I get it, of course
oh so this makes sense then
but it will not further my overall goal of understanding how to play avoidance
I think if I were a less selfish streamer, I would do clear attempts right now
since I could clear
but I just want to practice
until I feel like it's a clear that I made, not one that the game gave to me
this avoidance can't just let you go Kappa
I admit I am pretty attached to this game at this point
but I'm sure I will hate this game by the time I actually do clear it
I hated fish when I cleared it too
i am glad the game gave me a fluke clear because i finally felt free from this avoidance and from that point i finally moved to battlegrounds grind
fluke clears are ideal
I don't know if i started bg grind if ds wouldn't let me clear itself
less time wasted grinding attempts
because everything i was doing in fangames during ds grind is basically k3 ds k3 ds k3 ds k3 ds
oh, you were playing both concurrently?
now as i felt some progress in bg avoidances i feel a bit better about my fangame journies
yeah i was
I think you have a lot to feel proud about. k3, ds, + bg is quite the lineup
you already have better clears than most players
because my aimless ds attempts and slow progress in k3 was pretty poor gaming for me back then
yeah, gotta suffer through the poor gaming to get to the good gaming, that is what I tell myself
even now
when I am playing not so well today
I'm telling myself that in a few months things will be different
hopefully a ds clear I can feel proud about by that time
so as i cleared ds i managed to start playing other avoidances which is a good thing
yeah algo true
i always had an optimistic mindset
yeah, it is not good to play one avoidance for too long
(that couldn't cope with some rage moments though)
gotta be completely dead inside not to rage at these games LUL
well it is good to play one avoidance if you feel progress and overall do a real gaming
and my ds grind most of the time was an opposite
because i started playing it absolutely not knowing how hard this is
yeah, just from a practice perspective, I feel like you need to play more than 1 game to get good
so i was pretty inexperienced in ds when i started grinding it
i was inexperienced in fangames* overall
well, gotta start somewhere
I think it's better to play a fangame you're not ready for than to never touch a hard game at all
agree
I think it might be about time to wrap up for the day
I know it's late
And I'm glad for everyone who came by, including sin kun
yeah sinkun visit was a pleasant surprise
today was a very fun day even though there was not much in the way of super gaming LUL
you know, I think I have the well wishes of 4 DS clearers now
i had a good conversation with both of you
i glad about that
am
you, max, sin kun, razzor, and max
max 1 and max 2 LUL
whoops
just max 1
Kappa
anyways, it was nice to get another player's opinion on avoidance
especially a top player like sin kun
i was always interested in talking with them
and today's stream was an opportunity
just have to get good enough for them to notice you Keepo . we're moving up in the world.
anyways, bye for now
well thanks for the stream
better gaming next time hopefully
loremaster nojah is ruining my sleep schedule though
he streamed too late yesterday
1 am my time
oh
punish him!!!
I will punish him
I will backseat his game
anyways, bye, again, see you next time
such a punishment though Kappa
bye algo
